targets.expr:
sum by (repository, method) (rate(spring_data_repository_invocations_seconds_sum{application="$app",state="SUCCESS"}[5m]))

sum by (repository, method) (rate(spring_data_repository_invocations_seconds_count{application="$app",state="SUCCESS"}[5m]))
